title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 413.1 - Authorization to act as an FHA mortgage loan correspondent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 413.1 - Authorization to act as an FHA mortgage loan correspondent

State Regulations

Section
590
(5-a)
of the Banking Law and this Part
constitute the exclusive authority for mortgage brokers registered pursuant to
article 12-D of the Banking Law to act as FHA mortgage loan correspondents. Nothing in this Part shall prohibit mortgage bankers licensed pursuant to
article 12-D of the Banking Law and exempt organizations from acting as FHA
mortgage loan correspondents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
413.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
